setup.title: Welcome to Johannes
setup.intro: You have taken the first few steps toward a more pleasant content experience. You can learn more about Johannes or finishes the process below.
setup.noDb: We had a problem trying to connect to your CouchDB server. Check your settings in the config.json file and try reloading this page.
setup.remote: You are trying to access Johannes from another computer while it is not setup. By default this isn't allowed. If you need to do it, then edit the config.json file.
setup.start: Your system is ready to be setup. Follow the steps below to get started.
